sn48.70:1.1: “Mendicants, of all the trees belonging to the phoenixes, the red silk-cotton tree is said to be the best.
sn48.70:1.2: In the same way, the faculty of wisdom is said to be the best of the qualities that lead to awakening in terms of becoming awakened.
sn48.70:1.3: And what are the qualities that lead to awakening?
sn48.70:1.4: The faculties of faith, energy, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom are qualities that lead to awakening, in that they lead to becoming awakened.
sn48.70:1.5: Of all the trees belonging to the phoenixes, the red silk-cotton tree is said to be the best.
sn48.70:1.6: In the same way, the faculty of wisdom is said to be the best of the qualities that lead to awakening in terms of becoming awakened.”
